title: North Korea Fires Missile Off Its East Coast
sub_head: Launch comes days after North Korean leader Kim Jong Un vowed to pursue high-tech weapons
body:
SEOUL—North Korea fired a suspected ballistic missile into waters off its east coast on Wednesday, South Korean and Japanese authorities said, the first such test in the new year.
The missile was launched around 8:10 a.m. local time, before splashing into the waters between Korea and Japan, South Korea’s military said.
